title: Crystal Storm
summaries: The Crystal Storm is a (Desktop, Console, Old-gen console and Mobile versions) Hardmode / (3DS version) pre-Hardmode magic weapon that quickly fires a slightly spreading flood of tiny, bouncing purple crystals. The crystals are unaffected by gravity and last for about three seconds each, losing velocity gradually until they dissipate or upon contact with enemies. Their speed or fade upon impact does not affect their damage output, and they also provide a small amount of purple light.

The Crystal Storm is the <linked>Hallow</linked> counterpart to the <linked>Corruption's</linked> <linked>Cursed Flames</linked> and the <linked>Crimson's</linked> <linked>Golden Shower</linked>, all of which require a <linked>Spell Tome</linked> and ingredients exclusive to their underground biome counterparts.
On the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Crystal Storm may be obtained prior to entering Hardmode as a 1/500 (0.2%) chance to drop from Arch Demons.
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, its best modifier is Mythical.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, its best modifier is either Masterful for mana conservation or Godly/Demonic for higher damage output. It cannot get the Mythical modifier due to its low mana cost.
